data.text: @CDCMMWR @CDCgov @CDCDirector @CDCDirector You can start protecting our kids <5 *and* their vulnerable immunocompromised or older household members by allowing #offlabelu5 NOW! At a minimum you owe us an explanation why it is ethical to deny access especially as you no longer aim to reduce community spread. https://t.co/1JmpwBVXeL

@CDCMMWR @CDCgov @CDCDirector Very high household attack rates from index patients aged 0-4 years - who aren’t allowed to be vaccinated and most can’t mask or can’t mask well and need lots of up-close physical care. https://t.co/iozbmH2oMJ
